snippet: Kia is recalling 377,000 of its 2011-13 Sorentos, saying the vehicle can roll away unexpectedly because the transmission can be moved out of park without applying the brakes.
abstract: Kia is recalling 377,000 of its 2011-13 Sorentos due to transmission problem; says vehicle can roll away because transmission can be shifted out of park without using brakes.
lead_paragraph: Kia is recalling 377,000 of its 2011-13 Sorentos, saying the vehicle can roll away unexpectedly because the transmission can be moved out of park without applying the brakes.

headline.print_headline: Kia Plans Recall of Sorentos in Light of a Roll-Away Risk
headline.main: Kia Plans Recall of Sorentos in Light of a Roll-Away Risk
